title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 
indoor premises) 

31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19) (Operation of certain 
(Amendment) (No. 7) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 29th day of October

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 2. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) is amended, in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “(a) to (g)” 
for “(a) to (f)”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [564] 3

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This makes a technical amendment to SI No.385 of 2021.
